trans-unit.source: Specifies how an object or text in a control is horizontally aligned relative to an element of the control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como um objeto ou texto num controlo horizontalmente é alinhado relativamente de um elemento do controlo.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used in numerous classes.
trans-unit.target: Esta enumeração é utilizada em várias classes.

trans-unit.source: A partial list of these classes is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: É uma lista parcial de uma destas classes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: The object or text is aligned in the center of the control element.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ou o texto é alinhado no centro do elemento de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The object or text is aligned on the left of the control element.
trans-unit.target: O texto ou o objeto está alinhado à esquerda do elemento de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The object or text is aligned on the right of the control element.
trans-unit.target: O texto ou o objeto está alinhado à direita do elemento de controlo.
